line_2: With fervent zeal the Persian mov'd
With all the tenderness of Love;

line_1: As oft the nymph his ardent flame reprov'd;
line_2: He often told her how sincere he lov'd,

line_1: The other patient listen'd, nor reprov'd,
line_2: For 'midst his warmth he trac'd a mind he lov'd.

line_1: Their rashness oft my heart reproved,
line_2: "They were my nephews; boys I loved,
